sent.orig: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
sent.trans: 8我的灵阿，（原文作荣耀）你当醒起，琴瑟阿，你们当醒起。我自己要极早醒起。

sent.orig: One who dies awake is born awake.
sent.trans: 一个醒着死去的人会醒着出生。

sent.orig: Awake, my soul! Awake, harp and lyre! I will awaken the dawn.
sent.trans: 我的灵啊，你当醒起，琴瑟阿，你们当醒起，我自己要极早醒起。

sent.orig: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
sent.trans: 2琴瑟阿，你们当醒起。我自己要极早醒起。

sent.orig: When Chaoyang here, waterfowl awake, awake birds, a fishermen's also the beginning of the work day.
sent.trans: 每当朝阳初露，水鸟醒了，林鸟醒了，渔人也开始一天的劳作。
